page.title: 04My Life - a Biography
page.content: My Life Iam Barrie Atkinson. I go to our school at quarter to nine till half past three.When I get back I have a drink and then I get changed and go out to play.I play with Andrew Padget who has his tea with us. We play on our bikes until his mam comes to collect him and he goes and has his supper. Then we go out to play about on our bikes.My favourite place to go is through the beck when it is dry.We sometimes go to our den, which is a kind of hut.I sometimes go with my Dad who is a lorry driver. He usually delivers plasterboard for British Gypsum.
